name: Void Pyramid
description: Void Pyramid is a post-apocalyptic RPG set in the space-faring Egyptian empire. In the far future, the maniacal Prime Pharaoh rules the wastelands of Earth. Any who oppose him are exiled to the Void Pyramid. This outer space prison is populated by criminals, beasts, and mutants.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1.8 GHZ Memory: 768 MB RAM Storage: 25 MB available space

reviews.review_text: From what i've played. Unfortunatley it isnt very artsy. This is made up for, however, by great battle,plot, and mechanics! 7.3/10
Neat game. If you liked finding hidden stuff in classic RPGs, this is for you. Music and atmosphere are unique.
